source.e92891ff:
#About Administrative search, it can clearly be said that although search duration is low but revenue is generated especially in the month of February
#Regarding Informative search,revenue is comparable with administrative searche but types of visitor varies as different types of visitors visit this kind of websites or searches more often
#At the end, about the Product related websites and searches,the average duration a user spend is much higher than informative and administrative websites, also the revenue generated from these websites is also high
#Hence,product related search and websites dominates informative and administrative searches in terms of revenue and the types of visitors
